title: WTT: My Sovereign 460s for Your EPDGs
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: WTT: My Sovereign 460s for Your EPDGs
posts.post_content: I currently have two Sovereign 460s that I'd like to parlay into EPDG.  The Devore is slabbed by SGC and obviously trimmed.  I believe the Murray to be trimmed as well.  Willing to take trimmed, auth or beaters... let me know what you have.
